name: Nyasha Land of Elves Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack from Nyasha Land of Elves game.

Included tracks :

- My own solitude

- Night dreams

- That is how I leave now

- The Golden Forest

- When this land was young

Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
